entities.name: lucius malfoy
entities.description: Lucius Malfoy is a character in the story who has a moment of hesitation before acting. He is described as standing for a moment and having his right hand twitch as though he was longing to reach for his wand.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a character in the story who observes Lucius Malfoy's behavior. He is described as distinctly seeing Lucius's hand twitch.

entities.name: dobby
entities.description: Dobby is a house-elf who belongs to Lucius Malfoy and is summoned by him in the story.

relationships.description: Lucius Malfoy owns Dobby, as indicated by the fact that he summons Dobby to come with him.
Harry observes Lucius Malfoy's behavior and his interaction with Dobby.
